awscc_macie_findings_filter (Data Source)

Data Source schema for AWS::Macie::FindingsFilter

Schema

Required

  • id (String) Uniquely identifies the resource.

Read-Only

  • action (String) Findings filter action.
  • arn (String) Findings filter ARN.
  • description (String) Findings filter description
  • finding_criteria (Attributes) Findings filter criteria. (see below for nested schema)
  • findings_filter_id (String) Findings filter ID.
  • name (String) Findings filter name
  • position (Number) Findings filter position.
  • tags (Attributes List) A collection of tags associated with a resource (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for finding_criteria

Read-Only:

  • criterion (Attributes Map) Map of filter criteria. (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for finding_criteria.criterion

Read-Only:

  • eq (List of String)
  • gt (Number)
  • gte (Number)
  • lt (Number)
  • lte (Number)
  • neq (List of String)

Nested Schema for tags

Read-Only:

  • key (String) The tag's key.
  • value (String) The tag's value.
